nodes.bodyText: What about renaming RUST_SERVER_POST_PROCESS_FILE as RUST_POST_PROCESS_FILE to conform to other environment variable naming {lang}_POST_PROCESS_FILE (e.g. CPP_POST_PROCESS_FILE)?

And what about adding something similar to the following in processOpts?
f647b2f#diff-7946cad868d081bf8881db60979b628bR256-R259
